explains: n. 奇思遐想；变幻莫测（vagary 的复数）

sentences.en: And contact itself is subject to infinite vagaries.
sentences.cn: 而联系自己本身也变化无常。

sentences.en: Thereafter you are subject to the vagaries of the market.
sentences.cn: 此后，你就要看市场行情的变化了。

sentences.en: The final reason for concern arises from the vagaries of the financial crisis.
sentences.cn: 最后一个担心的理由是金融危机的变幻莫测。
